column2: zwracać się do kogoś na du
zwracać się do kogoś na Sie
to go home, to drive home
to change, to switch, to replace
to put, to set, to place
to start, to begin (an event, an action)
to be right, to be correct
to exhibit, here: to issue, to write
to bathe, take a bath, here: to swim
to appeal, to like, be pleasing
here: to shine, also: to seem, appear
to mean; to want to say
to stick; here: to be in
to listen to, hear somebody / something
to belong to (here: to be accepted as part of a group)
to tell somebody something, to leave someone a message
to carry, here: to wear something
to pronounce / to say something out loud
to provide (for something, here: for retirement)
to be glad, to look forward to
